mods_postprocessor
==================

This module is used to fix bugs in XSLT templates.

Sometimes, there are missing tags, or the data are with special characters,
which are not required (``Ostrava]`` for example - we need only ``Ostrava``).


Submodules
----------

    :maxdepth: 1

    /api/mods_postprocessor/multi_monograph.rst
